DOC.brief_summary: The project design document college undergraduate relationships among sleep/wake timing duration , use mobile phone electronic device , food timing content , self-reported mood physiological measure .
DOC.brief_title: Multi-scale Modeling Sleep Behaviors Social Networks
DOC.detailed_description: College undergraduate study cohort ~ 50 fall spring semester . They complete diary morning even sleep/wake timing , time social school activity , mood . They wear physiological sensor . They install ( 1 ) application mobile phone track timing , duration de-identified sender/recipient phone call text message , use internet apps ( content name internet site apps ) ( 2 ) meal content timing . They also spend least one overnight session provide saliva sample later assay hormone .
DOC.criteria: undergraduate institution permission perform study own mobile device phone app instal ability wear wristworn sensor travel outside one time zone start approximately 2 week monitoring begin end approximately one month monitoring . participation prior group study
